languages.text: "В системе есть станция {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}, но эти затворники не ведут дела ни с кем. Даже меня ни разу не приглашали на борт. Впрочем, для представителей семей Вольных Торговцев они делали исключения — может, сделают и для вас?"

traits.locale_text: "В системе есть станция {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}, но эти затворники не ведут дела ни с кем. Даже меня ни разу не приглашали на борт. Впрочем, для представителей семей Вольных Торговцев они делали исключения — может, сделают и для вас?"

languages.text: "There is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in this system, but those hermits don't do business with anyone. Not even I have ever been invited on board. However, they've been known to make exceptions for members of Rogue Trader families. Perhaps, they will make one for you?"
languages.original_text: "В системе есть станция {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}, но эти затворники не ведут дела ни с кем. Даже меня ни разу не приглашали на борт. Впрочем, для представителей семей Вольных Торговцев они делали исключения — может, сделают и для вас?"

However, they've been known to make exceptions for members of Rogue Trader families. Perhaps they'll make one for you?"

However, they've been known to make exceptions for members of Rogue Trader families. Perhaps, they will make one for you?"

"There is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in this system, but those hermits don't do business with anyone. Not even I have ever been invited on board. However, they've been known to make exceptions for members of Rogue Trader families. Perhaps, they will make one for you?"

languages.text: "Es gibt in diesem System eine Station der {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, doch diese Einsiedler interagieren mit niemandem. Nicht einmal ich wurde je auf die Station eingeladen. Allerdings machen sie hin und wieder eine Ausnahme für Mitglieder von Freihändlerfamilien. Vielleicht ja auch für Euch?"
languages.original_text: "There is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in this system, but those hermits don't do business with anyone. Not even I have ever been invited on board. However, they've been known to make exceptions for members of Rogue Trader families. Perhaps, they will make one for you?"

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt in diesem System eine Station der {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, doch diese Einsiedler interagieren mit niemandem. Nicht einmal ich wurde je auf die Station eingeladen. Allerdings machen sie hin und wieder eine Ausnahme für Mitglieder von Freihändlerfamilien. Vielleicht ja auch für Euch."

languages.text: « Il y a une station de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} dans ce système, mais ces ermites ne font affaire avec personne. Même moi, je n'ai jamais été invité à bord. Cependant, ils ont la réputation de faire des exceptions pour les membres des familles de libres-marchands. Peut-être aurez-vous droit à cette faveur. »
languages.original_text: "There is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in this system, but those hermits don't do business with anyone. Not even I have ever been invited on board. However, they've been known to make exceptions for members of Rogue Trader families. Perhaps, they will make one for you?"

traits.locale_text: « Il y a une station de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} dans ce système, mais ces ermites ne font affaire avec personne. Même moi, je n'ai jamais été invité à bord. Cependant, ils ont la réputation de faire des exceptions pour les membres des familles de libres-marchands. Peut-être aurez-vous droit à cette faveur. »

languages.text: “这个星系里有座{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}的星站，但那群特立独行的人从来不和任何人做生意，就连我也没得到过邀请。不过，据我了解，他们曾对行商浪人家族的成员破过例，或许您也会有机会见到他们。”
languages.original_text: "There is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in this system, but those hermits don't do business with anyone. Not even I have ever been invited on board. However, they've been known to make exceptions for members of Rogue Trader families. Perhaps, they will make one for you?"

traits.locale_text: “这个星系里有座{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}的星站，但那群特立独行的人从来不和任何人做生意，就连我也没得到过邀请。不过，据我了解，他们曾对行商浪人家族的成员破过例，或许您也会有机会见到他们。”

languages.text: 「この星系には{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}のステーションがあるが、そうそう人前に出ない者達で、誰かと関わることはない。私でも招かれたことはないのだ。だが、自由開拓者の一族には例外を認めることがある。もしかしたら、あなたにもその例外が適用されるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "There is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in this system, but those hermits don't do business with anyone. Not even I have ever been invited on board. However, they've been known to make exceptions for members of Rogue Trader families. Perhaps, they will make one for you?"

traits.locale_text: 「この星系には{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}のステーションがあるが、そうそう人前に出ない者達で、誰かと関わることはない。私でも招かれたことはないのだ。だが、自由開拓者の一族には例外を認めることがある。もしかしたら、あなたにもその例外が適用されるかもしれない」

languages.text: «Hay una estación de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} en este sistema, pero esos ermitaños no hacen negocios con nadie. Ni siquiera a mí me han invitado a bordo. Sin embargo, se sabe que hacen excepciones con miembros de familias de Comerciantes Independientes. Quizá hagan una por usted».
languages.original_text: "There is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in this system, but those hermits don't do business with anyone. Not even I have ever been invited on board. However, they've been known to make exceptions for members of Rogue Trader families. Perhaps, they will make one for you?"

traits.locale_text: «Hay una estación de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} en este sistema, pero esos ermitaños no hacen negocios con nadie. Ni siquiera a mí me han invitado a bordo. Sin embargo, se sabe que hacen excepciones con miembros de familias de Comerciantes Independientes. Quizá reciba una».

languages.text: "Bu sistemde bir {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} istasyonu mevcut fakat o münzeviler kimseyle iş yapmazlar. Beni bile davet etmediler. Öte yandan bazı Hür Tacir hanelerinin fertleri için istisna yaptıkları olmuştu. Belki sizin için de yaparlar."
languages.original_text: "There is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in this system, but those hermits don't do business with anyone. Not even I have ever been invited on board. However, they've been known to make exceptions for members of Rogue Trader families. Perhaps, they will make one for you?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu sistemde bir {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} istasyonu mevcut fakat o münzeviler kimseyle iş yapmazlar. Beni bile davet etmediler. Öte yandan bazı Hür Tacir hanelerinin fertleri için istisna yaptıkları olmuştu. Belki sizin için de yaparlar."
